original_text: But some other people laughed at the disciples. They said, ‘These people have drunk too much wine!’
korean_text: 또 어떤 이들은 조롱하여 이르되 그들이 새 술에 취하였다 하더라

sentences.original_text: But some other people laughed at the disciples.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 다른 어떤 사람들은 제자들을 비웃었습니다.

sentences.original_text: 'These people have drunk too much wine!'
